title: Sigh...can someone in challenger tell me how many creeps are required to freeze the lane?
body:
Like how many less?

Doesn't matter what I do, the fucking creeps will shove as hard as they can and get me killed

It's fucking disgusting, i have less creeps and somehow after i come back to lane it's pushed right in front of the tower and i have to stand there and die to the jungler

Really, how does creep management even work, 3 years and i still dont get it
